imdb.title: Yowamushi pedaru
imdb.plot: Onoda is a cheerful otaku looking to join his new school's anime club, eager to finally make some friends. Unfortunately, the club has been disbanded and somehow he stumbled into the bicycle club.

episodes.title: Phase 49
episodes.plot: Midosuji is going forward with his plan to block Arakita and force Fukutomi to work alone. But Hakone academy has something else in mind.

episodes.title: The Aces
episodes.plot: Midosuji makes another insane move and makes a 4 second gap between other aces. But Kinjou and Fukutomi are not giving up that easily.

episodes.title: Akira
episodes.plot: Midosuji is in the lead, closing in on the finish line, thinking he has won the race. But Kinjou and Fukutomi are slowly gaining on him.

episodes.title: Resolution
episodes.plot: After miscalculating and losing the second day, Midosuji declares that he will drop out of the race.

episodes.title: The Three Kilometers to the Pharmacy
episodes.plot: Midosuji is biking back home when he meets Onoda in the mountains.

episodes.title: Those Who Have
episodes.plot: Day 3 is about to begin and it seems like it is going to be a two team race.

episodes.title: The Pack Approaches
episodes.plot: Machimiya is leading the pack to the front and has caught up to Arakita and Onoda.

episodes.title: Arakita
episodes.plot: Onoda has been pulled into the pack and is going to need some help to pull out.

episodes.title: The Fighting Dog of Kure
episodes.plot: Arakita accepts Sakamichi's desperate request to cooperate. Together with Manami, the trio catches up to Machimiya through Arakita's beastly pulling. Hiroshima Kureminami's Ibiya proposes a "20 meter gap race" to Arakita. Machimiya reveals the fighting instincts he was hiding and rides completely out of control!

episodes.title: Because I Can Go to Akiba for Free
episodes.plot: Onoda Sakamichi is a huge anime fan that dislikes anything that has to do with sports. When he joins Chiba Sohoku High, he learns that their anime club has been shut down and he tries to restore it.

episodes.title: To Recruit More Members
episodes.plot: After seeing Onoda climb, Imaizumi challenges him to a race up the school's steep rear gate slope.

episodes.title: I Don't Have Any Friends
episodes.plot: Onoda has received a little help from Miki as the race against Imaizumi continues.

episodes.title: Naruko Shoukichi
episodes.plot: As always, Onoda has returned to Akiba to buy some more anime goods. There, he meets a redheaded boy named Naruko Shoukichi.

episodes.title: The Sohoku High School Bicycle Racing Team
episodes.plot: Onoda is trying to decide between his hopes of restoring anime club and joining his high school bicycle racing team.

episodes.title: Welcoming Race
episodes.plot: Onoda is excited he gets to race with Imaizumi and Naruko but he quickly realizes he stands no chance against them on his mommy bike, yet he refuses to give up.

episodes.title: I Want to Catch Up!
episodes.plot: Onoda has acquired a road racer and is aiming to catch up to Imaizumi and Naruko.

episodes.title: Sprint Climb!!
episodes.plot: Now that Onoda has reached Imaizumi and Naruko, the battle for the top of the mountain begins.

episodes.title: Full Power vs. Full Power
episodes.plot: Race for the title "King of the Mountain" continues as Onoda and Imaizumu are giving it their all to be the first one to reach the top.

episodes.title: Peak Spider
episodes.plot: Specialized training begin for all first years. Onoda is assigned to train with third-year Makishima also known as "Peak Spider".

episodes.title: Human Bullet Train!!
episodes.plot: One day after the special training has started, the freshman found out that the Inter High Preliminaries have already started. Onoda, Naruko and Imaizumi rush over to see how their team is doing.

episodes.title: First Day of Camp!
episodes.plot: Sohoku bicycle club is headed to a special cycling facility in the Mountains for a special four day training.

episodes.title: Imaizumi and Naruko's 1000km
episodes.plot: Everyone is trying to reach 1000 km within the four day time limit. However, Onoda is struggling.

episodes.title: Reunion at Dawn
episodes.plot: With day 2 over, Onoda has completed only 390 km. Will he be able to complete 610 km in just two days?

episodes.title: Strategy
episodes.plot: Manami has inspired Onoda to compete for his spot on the Inter High team. But the second years Aoyagi and Teshima are not going to give up their spot without a fight.

episodes.title: Breakthrough
episodes.plot: Battle against second year Teshima continues as Imaizumi and Naruko put their hopes in Onoda on the climb.

episodes.title: Onoda in Last Place
episodes.plot: Onoda managed to break through Teshima's defense. But Aoyagi has caught up and inspired Teshima to go all out. Onoda's lack of experience might prove fatal here.

episodes.title: All-Out Battle
episodes.plot: An all out battle ensues, to determine who is going to the Inter High.

episodes.title: A New Start
episodes.plot: Sohoku bicycle club has returned from the training camp and Kinjo, team captain, is about to announce who is going to the Inter High.

episodes.title: Manami Sangaku
episodes.plot: Sohoku's team has been set. So we focus on Hakone academy's race for their last member. It is a battle of climber between Manani and Kuroda.

episodes.title: Snake of the Stone Path
episodes.plot: The first years are about the learn the truth of what happened at the previous Inter High.

episodes.title: The Inter-High Begins
episodes.plot: Teams arrive at Enoshima for the start of the race. Interviews are being held when someone from Imaizumi's past makes an appearance.

episodes.title: Top Sprinter!!
episodes.plot: The Inter High race has begun and when the parade is over it is time to determine who is the fastest sprinter.

episodes.title: Trembling Izumida
episodes.plot: Race between top three sprinters is well under way as current leader, Izumida of the Hakone academy, criticizes Naruko and Tadokoro. But they are about to unleash their special moves.

episodes.title: Loss
episodes.plot: After revealing all their secret moves, top three sprinters are left 700 meter short of the sprint checkpoint as they go all out in a battle to acquire the title of the fastest sprinter.

episodes.title: I Can See the Sky
episodes.plot: After taking the sprint checkpoint, Sohoku is able to go to the front of the pack. Everything seems to be going well but then Manami senses that something bad is going to happen.

episodes.title: Toudou, God of the Mountains
episodes.plot: Accident has left Onoda in last place and Sohoku with only one climber. Rivalry between Hakone's climber Toudou and Sohoku's climber Makishima comes to light as they approach the climb.

episodes.title: 100 Man Barrier
episodes.plot: Onoda is in last place but he is not giving up. With little help from Teshima, Onoda sets out to pass 100 riders in front of him and catch up to his team.

episodes.title: The Summit
episodes.plot: After realizing Makishima is not going to race him, Toudou begins to lose the spirit to climb as he doesn't have his rival to race against.

episodes.title: Arakita and Imaizumi
episodes.plot: After Hakone academy takes the climb, it is up to Arakita and Imaizumi to pull their aces to the finish line.

episodes.title: The Strong Three
episodes.plot: As Kinjou and Fukutomi are racing towards the finish line, a surprise rider shows up to challenge them for first place.

episodes.title: Night of Hope
episodes.plot: After day 1 is over, Tadokoro has fallen ill and Imaizumi seems to have lost the will to fight after letting Midosuji pass him so easily. Sohoku has a lot of obstacles to overcome as day 2 begins.

episodes.title: You Are the Princess
episodes.plot: Tadokoro is unable to start as day 2 begins. But after Onoda learns that Tadokoro is ill, he decides to follow the orders he was given by Kinjou.

episodes.title: Shinkai Hayato
episodes.plot: Midosuji catches up to Hakone academy that is in first place and challenges them for the sprint checkpoint.

episodes.title: The Winner
episodes.plot: Sohoku has slowly started to lose the spirit to fight as they find out that Onoda and Tadokoro are making their way to them. Kinjou takes the lead as he decides no one is going to pass them until all 6 of them are together.

episodes.title: Strongest and Fastest
episodes.plot: Shinkai and Midosuji continue their fight for the sprint checkpoint as Onoda and Tadokoro reach Kumamoto Daiichi in 4th place.

episodes.title: Passing the Crown
episodes.plot: After losing the sprint checkpoint, Hakone's team seems to be falling apart. Meanwhile, Midosuji decides to leave his sprinters behind and take the mountain checkpoint.

episodes.title: The Soul of Sohoku
episodes.plot: Midosuji thinks he is winning, but Sohoku quickly catches up. However, Onoda seems to have reached his limit.
